attachments.title: Seeking Julia Mentors and Projects for GSoC 2021
attachments.text: Hey all, the Julia Language will be applying for Google Summer of Code this year. With GSoC 2021, there are significant changes to the timeline and other attributes of the program. Please see here: Defining a Project (Ideas List) | Google Summer of Code Guides For previous mentors who would like to mentor again in 2021, we need to update each project on the website here: <http://www.julialang.org/jsoc/gsoc|www.julialang.org/jsoc/gsoc> at main · JuliaLang/www.julialang.org · GitHub Please open a PR with the updated specs of the pro...
